Class att.grappa.MDiamond 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----att.grappa.DrawObject
           |
           +----att.grappa.DrawNode
                   |
                   +----att.grappa.Diamond
                           |
                           +----att.grappa.MDiamond
public class MDiamond
extends Diamond
The DrawObject to use for rendering nodes whose shape is a Mdiamond. The drawn representation is a diamond with four lines that form triangles at each of the four tips of the diamond. It is possible that auxiliary labels are contained in the top and bottom triangles.

Version:
1.1, 30 Sep 1999; Copyright 1996 - 1999 by AT&T Corp.
Author:
John Mocenigo, Research @ AT&T Labs

MDiamond()
Construct a modified-diamond-shaped DrawObject for nodes.

 public MDiamond()
Construct a modified-diamond-shaped DrawObject for nodes.
